title: Fluids Fundamentals
description: Flowfield concepts, fluid properties, conservation equations for flows, isentropic flow, shocks and expansions, introduction to flows with friction and heat transfer. Applications to aerospace devices.

prerequisites: ME 3322 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
